trans-unit.source: Manages the placement of breakpoints for a debugging process.
trans-unit.target: 管理偵錯程序的中斷點位置。

trans-unit.source: The activity designer contextual state.
trans-unit.target: 活動設計工具的內容狀態。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Debug.DebuggerService" /> class with the specified editing context.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的編輯內容，建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Debug.DebuggerService" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current scope of execution in the source file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定原始程式檔中目前執行的範圍。

trans-unit.source: A position in the source file that marks the start of execution.
trans-unit.target: 在原始程式檔中標示執行開始的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current location of execution.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前的執行位置。

trans-unit.source: A location in the source file.
trans-unit.target: 原始程式檔中的位置。

trans-unit.source: A location in the source file.
trans-unit.target: 原始程式檔中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a breakpoint from its location in the source file.
trans-unit.target: 從原始程式檔的中斷點位置刪除中斷點。

trans-unit.source: A location in the source file.
trans-unit.target: 原始程式檔中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the debugger service is visible.
trans-unit.target: 確認偵錯工具服務是可見的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the latest breakpoint locations.
trans-unit.target: 傳回最新中斷點位置的清單。

trans-unit.source: A list of breakpoints of type <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.Debug.BreakpointInfo.SourceLocation" /> culled from the source file.
trans-unit.target: 從原始程式檔挑選之 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.Debug.BreakpointInfo.SourceLocation" /> 型別的中斷點清單。

trans-unit.source: A source file location known to be inexact.
trans-unit.target: 已知不精確的原始程式檔位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns an exact source file location based on the start and end line numbers of the activity in its serialized XAML form.
trans-unit.target: 根據活動的開始和結束行號，以序列化的 XAML 形式傳回確實的原始程式檔位置。

trans-unit.source: An exact location in the source file.
trans-unit.target: 原始程式檔中的確實位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the source file name in the viewer is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出檢視器中的原始程式檔名是否已隱藏。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the source file name is hidden; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果原始程式檔名稱是隱藏的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The location in the source file that receives the new breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 在原始程式檔中，接收新中斷點的位置。

trans-unit.source: The type of the breakpoint; for example, None, Enabled, Bounded, or Conditional.
trans-unit.target: 中斷點的類型，例如，[無]、[已啟用]、[已繫結] 或 [條件式]。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a new breakpoint of the specified type at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的位置插入指定之類型的新中斷點。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether debugging is the current state.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出偵錯是否為目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if debugging is the current state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果偵錯是目前的狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Resets breakpoints and prepares for breakpoint refresh.
trans-unit.target: 重設中斷點並準備重新整理中斷點。

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently selected location from the designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前從設計工具選取的位置。

trans-unit.source: The position in the source file that is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 在原始程式檔中目前選取的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location of the breakpoint to update.
trans-unit.target: 要更新之中斷點的位置。

trans-unit.source: A new breakpoint type from the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Debug.BreakpointTypes" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 來自 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Debug.BreakpointTypes" /> 列舉的新中斷點類型。

trans-unit.source: Updates the appearance of a specified breakpoint to show the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 更新指定之中斷點的外觀以顯示指定的類型。

trans-unit.source: A list of model item and breakpoint pairs.
trans-unit.target: 模型項目清單與中斷點配對。

trans-unit.source: Collects the new mapping of model item and breakpoints from SourceLocationMapping.
trans-unit.target: 從 SourceLocationMapping 收集模型項目與中斷點的新對應。
